PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_SpaceThermalDesign
PropertySetDef.Definition: Space or zone HVAC design requirements. HISTORY: New property set in IFC Release 1.0 (Pset_SpaceHvacInformation); renamed to Pset_SpaceThermalDesign and revised in IFC2x2.

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingDesignAirflow
PropertyDef.Definition: The air flowrate required during the peak cooling conditions.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ピーク時の冷房条件で要求される給気量。

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingDesignAirflow
PropertyDef.Definition: The air flowrate required during the peak heating conditions, but could also be determined by minimum ventilation requirement or minimum air change requirements.

PropertyDef.Name: TotalSensibleHeatGain
PropertyDef.Definition: The total sensible heat or energy gained by the space during the peak cooling conditions.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ピーク時の冷房条件で取得した顕熱或いはエネルギー。

PropertyDef.Name: TotalHeatGain
PropertyDef.Definition: The total amount of heat or energy gained by the space at the time of the space's peak cooling conditions.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ピーク時の室内最大冷房負荷時に取得した顕熱或いはエネルギー。

PropertyDef.Name: TotalHeatLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: The total amount of heat or energy lost by the space at the time of the space's peak heating conditions.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: ピーク時の室内最大暖房負荷時に取得・損失した熱或いはエネルギー。

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingDryBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Inside dry bulb temperature for cooling design.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 冷房設計における室内設計乾球温度。

PropertyDef.Name: CoolingRelativeHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: Inside relative humidity for cooling design.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 冷房設計における室内設計相対湿度。

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingDryBulb
PropertyDef.Definition: Inside dry bulb temperature for heating design.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 暖房設計における室内設計乾球温度。

PropertyDef.Name: HeatingRelativeHumidity
PropertyDef.Definition: Inside relative humidity for heating design.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 暖房設計における室内設計相対湿度。

PropertyDef.Name: VentilationAirFlowrate
PropertyDef.Definition: Ventilation outside air requirement for the space.

PropertyDef.Name: ExhaustAirFlowrate
PropertyDef.Definition: Design exhaust air flow rate for the space.

PropertyDef.Name: CeilingRAPlenum
PropertyDef.Definition: Ceiling plenum used for return air or not. TRUE = Yes, FALSE = No.

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 天井裏還気（リタンあり・なし） TRUE=あり、FALSE=なし。

PropertyDef.Name: BoundaryAreaHeatLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: Heat loss per unit area for the boundary object. This is a design input value for use in the absence of calculated load data.

NameAliases.NameAlias: 周辺関連設備の熱ロス

DefinitionAliases.DefinitionAlias: 単位面積ありた周辺関連設備の熱ロス。空調負荷計算値以外の設計設定値。

PsetDefinitionAliases.PsetDefinitionAlias: 室内或いはゾーンの空調設計要求。履歴：IFC1.0の新PropertySet（Pset_SpaceHvacInformation)、：IFC2ｘ２にPset_SpaceThermalDesignと再定義された。
